programme.desc: 6/13. Tha Fionn a' feuchainn ri athair a stad is tha e feumach air taic bho Na Neachdan. Fionn is trying to stop his father and needs help from the Neachdan family.

programme.title: Alba Eagalach
programme.desc: 5/8. The CBBC ALBA team learn about life in the 17th century on a visit to Mary King's Close in Edinburgh.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol...
programme.desc: ...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 9/52. Dave and his friends embark on a school trip along the canal where they awaken an ancient monster called Big Lippy.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol...
programme.desc: ...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 10/52. Dave finds a handheld computer game at the dump. The game involves killing zombies which his friend, Zombie Katie, finds rather insulting.

programme.title: Turas a' Bhradain/The Salmon's Journey
programme.desc: 2/6. Iasgach a' bhradain air cuid de na h-aibhnichean is lluinne an Alba - cuide ri Neen NicAoidh. An odyssey through Scotland's fishing rivers with Neen MacKay.

programme.title: SpeakGaelic S4 (B2)
programme.desc: 5/26. Singer and Gaelic teacher Margaret Macleod Nicholson is Joy's studio guest, and Calum Maclean visits Scotland's newest city and once ancient capital, Dunfermline.

programme.title: An L
programme.desc: Naidheachdan ionadail, niseanta is eadar-niseanta gach l cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.

programme.title: Fillte
programme.desc: 1/6. Fillte travels throughout Scotland, visiting the country's finest woven craft producers.

programme.title: An Cogadh Fuar: Cold War Stories
programme.desc: 3/3. Stories of how the Cold War impacted the lives of ordinary people. Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.

programme.title: Rurachd (Foraging)
programme.desc: 3/6. Mary Ann and Lucy explore plants that thrive at the edge, from cycle paths to farmyards and wild garden corners.

programme.title: Dna | Scotland's Wild Side
programme.desc: 3/4. Home to centuries-old culture and breathtaking scenery, Morocco exerts an irresistible pull. Coinneach Rankin travels through Morocco's Souss Massa region with Annie MacNeil.

programme.title: Sar Sgeoil: Greenvoe
programme.desc: Cathy MacDonald on George Mackay Brown's prophetic novel, Greenvoe. Cathy Dhmhnallach a'cnuasachadh mu nobhail fisneachail Greenvoe le George Mackay Brown.

programme.title: Mach Seo! - An Roinn Erpa
programme.desc: 2/6. Ramsay visits Naples and the Amalfi Coast. Tha Ramsay a' tadhal air Naples agus (Cladaichean) Costa Amalfi.

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh r bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh r bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Treubh an Tuathanais (Big Barn Farm)
programme.desc: 6/20. Tha ceud cabhaig air Goraidh an-diugh 'son cluich cmh' ri charaidean. Goraidh can't wait to play with his friends today.

programme.title: Boban is Fuigheag
programme.desc: 36/40. Nuair tha daolag-bhreac a' cliidh, tha Fuigheag a' don a chuid! When a ladybird visits, Fuigheag protects his things!

programme.title: Sionnach agus Maigheach (Fox & Hare)
programme.desc: 19/26. Some of Tusk's friends say his home isn't cosy enough, so Tusk decides to throw a midsummer's Christmas party to prove them wrong.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: 97/104. Tha cuirm phupaid air a chur air digh - ach chan eil e furasta obrachadh cmhla! A puppet show has been organised, but it isn't easy to work together!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: 98/104. Tha Bing ag ionnsachadh gu bheil e a' faireachdainn math nuair a tha thu onarach. Bing learns that it feels good to be honest.

programme.title: Pompon Am Mathan Beag/Pompon Little Bear
programme.desc: 28/39. L nan Athair 's tha Pompon na bhrd an-diugh. Pompon is a poet today, for Father's Day.

programme.title: Stiridh
programme.desc: 15/82. Kirsteen NicDhmhnaill a' leughadh Co-sheirm na Maidne. Kirsteen MacDonald reads Co-sheirm na Maidne.

programme.title: An Teaghlach Roghail an...
programme.desc: ...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 21/52. Tha Stella le car na h-adhbrann is tha aire gach neach oirre. Stella has a sprained ankle and everyone is paying her lots of attention.

programme.title: An Teaghlach Roghail an...
programme.desc: ...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 22/52. Tha Stella air cuireadh fhaighinn gu dnnear. Stella has been invited to dinner.

programme.title: A-null 's a-nall
programme.desc: 4/7. Tha mran ri dhanamh san taigh r 's dil ri bibidh r cuideachd! There's much to do at the new house and a new baby due, too!

programme.title: Stri
programme.desc: 4/12. Alexa a' farpais an aghaidh preasantairean CBBC ALBA. Alexa competes against the CBBC ALBA presenters.

programme.title: Flix
programme.desc: 9/13. Tha Flix 'son bhith na shr chat feireil - dreach mar athair, Zeno. Flix wants to be the ultimate outdoor cat - just like his father, Zeno.

programme.title: An L
programme.desc: Naidheachdan ionadail, niseanta is eadar-niseanta gach l cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.

programme.title: Fraochy Bay
programme.desc: 2/10. The Fraochy Bay family building dynasty The James Brothers have been commissioned to bring sporting fun to the town by building new flumes at the swimming pool.

programme.title: Machair
programme.desc: 11/13. Drama Gidhlig stidhichte ann an Ledhas. Gaelic soap based on the Isle of Lewis.

programme.title: Brunch le Abigail
programme.desc: 11/12. Tha Abigail a' danamh Overnight Oats le Sbhagan is Piostaisean. Abigail makes raspberry and pistachio overnight oats.

programme.title: Miann na Maighdinn-mara/Mermaid Tales
programme.desc: 3/4. Kate looks on as her brother Seumas tests out his speedboat and she learns about a 19th-century shipwreck.

programme.title: Lios Mhiri
programme.desc: 5/5. Tha Miri a' danamh staran agus a' tadhal air dithis le croitean iongantach. Mairi goes path-building and harvesting before visiting an island woodland and market garden.

programme.title: The Barrowland Roar
programme.desc: Iain Spanish with the story of The Barrowland. Iain Spinneach le sgeulachd Barrowland. Contains some strong language.

programme.title: Ath-thogail...
programme.desc: ...Notre-Dame/Rebuilding Notre-Dame. 1/3. A year after a major fire, archaeologists and scientists examine the battered stones of Notre-Dame in Paris.

programme.title: Skipinnish aig a' Chaisteal (Shorts)
programme.desc: 3/10. Skipinnish le Eagle's Wing aig cuirm-chiil bho Chaisteal Dhn ideann. Skipinnish perform Eagle's Wing at a concert from Edinburgh Castle.

programme.title: Cuirm@Celtic Connections:...
programme.desc: ...Capercaillie & The BBC SSO. Capercaillie and The BBC SSO collaborate in a performance at Glasgow Royal Concert Hall.

programme.title: The Jet Set - Timeshift
programme.desc: A look at the glamorous heyday of the international jet set from the 1950s to the 1970s, the golden age before celebrity became a dirty word. Contributors include Jackie Stewart.

programme.title: The Making of King Arthur
programme.desc: Simon Armitage traces the evolution of the Arthurian legend through the literature of the medieval age and reveals that King Arthur is not the great national hero we think he is.

programme.title: Leonora Carrington: The Lost Surrealist
programme.desc: Film about artist Leonora Carrington who worked alongside Max Ernst, Andre Breton and Pablo Picasso in Paris at the height of surrealism, yet lived out her days in Mexico City.

programme.title: The Gunpowder Plot: Timewatch
programme.desc: Documentary that re-examines the attempt to blow up the Houses of Parliament in 1605. Computer graphics recreate the scene and show how close the plotters came to success.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: 3/4. Autumnal fog and an overheating engine prove to be problems for narrowboater Robbie Cumming as he navigates a Roman waterway and a tidal river.

programme.title: How the Celts Saved Britain
programme.desc: 2/2. Dan Snow reveals how the Irish saved Britain from cultural oblivion in the Dark Ages, as missionaries brought literacy and technology to Scotland and England.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries -...
programme.desc: ...Loughborough to Braunston. 4/4. Robbie Cumming has issues with ice before taking on the famous Foxton lock flight. His destination is Braunston, the spiritual home for narrowboaters.

programme.title: The Secret Rules of Modern Living: Algorithms

programme.desc: On the box this time: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars, Holidaying with Jane McDonald, Open House: The Great Sex Experiment and Peaky Blinders.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Crook and Ladder: When members of the Springfield fire department are injured, Homer, Moe, Apu and Skinner volunteer to be temporary firefighters.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Pilot: The first ever episode of the hit sitcom. Leonard and Sheldon's geeky world is shaken up by the arrival of a beautiful new neighbour.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Big Bran Hypothesis: Sheldon sneaks into Penny's flat to tidy it. She's not happy about it.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Fuzzyboots Corollary: Leonard is upset when he discovers that Penny is seeing someone, so he plucks up the courage to ask a woman out on a date.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Royal Visit: When Haley's astrophysicist boyfriend visits, Claire and Phil compete to prove who's smarter. Mitch and Cam go to a yoga retreat.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the New Pastor: Tina spends time with the charming new minister who she helped choose for her church.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to Trivia Night: Calvin and Dave get shown up by Gemma and Marty at trivia night, so they plot to redeem themselves.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Catch of the Day: Phil is convinced he's going to have a bad luck day after failing to complete his daily superstition. Mitch is certain that Cam is undermining him.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Sex, Lies, and Kickball: Jay's best friend, Shorty, returns from Costa Rica and stays at the house so that they can reconnect. And Alex is ready to shed her good-girl image.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Mama Maria's: Gordon Ramsay visits Mama Maria's, a failing restaurant in Brooklyn, New York, where owner John is overwhelmed by running a business that's become stuck in the past.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: On their final dates, one couple discuss the long-distance dilemma... can it work? And an ill-chosen date venue sparks a rollercoaster of emotions for others.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Sorry Not Sorry: Lisa calls her teacher a hack and refuses to apologise. Then she learns Ms Hoover's private pain.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Springfield Summer Christmas for Christmas: A cable channel films a Christmas movie in Springfield, and Skinner falls in love.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Skywalker Incursion: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at Berkeley, they take a detour during the journey to try to meet one of their idols.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Fortification Implementation: When Sheldon and Amy build a blanket fort, they come to a major crossroads in their relationship. Howard meets his half-brother.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Flip Flop: Phil is confident that he can sell Claire and Cam's renovated house, but when it proves harder than he thought, he resorts to desperate measures.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Career Day: Phil is chuffed to share the wonders of residential real estate with Luke and Manny's classmates for career day, but unfortunately his nemesis, Gil Thorpe, shows up.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Grant Allocation Derivation: Leonard is made responsible for distributing extra grant money. Bernadette turns the garden playhouse into a hideaway to escape her family.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Citation Negation: Sheldon and Amy get some devastating news. Bernadette asks Stuart's girlfriend Denise to teach her how to beat Howard at a video game.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The VCR Illumination: Sheldon and Amy are still upset about their theory being disproven, but a video tape from Sheldon's past inspires him not to give up.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Paintball Scattering: Jealousy, trust issues and tension among the couples in the gang cause mayhem when Penny and Leonard organise a paintball game.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Set Up: The FBI take over a high-profile case but Jake keeps digging anyway. Amy and Rosa negotiate with O'Sullivan and the police union.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Game of Boyles: Terry, Jake and Charles visit the Boyle family farm. Amy and Rosa try to help Captain Holt with his personal life.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Man from G.R.A.M.P.A.: A British secret agent comes to Springfield on the trail of a Russian spy. Guest starring Stephen Fry.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Last Barfighter: A secret society of bartenders seek vengeance on Homer and his friends after Moe breaks their most sacred rule.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: On their final dates, one couple discuss the long-distance dilemma... can it work? And an ill-chosen date venue sparks a rollercoaster of emotions for others.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Luminous Fish Effect: Getting fired forces Sheldon to ponder life outside physics, so Leonard has to take drastic action to snap his friend out of his reverie.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hamburger Postulate: Leonard thinks he's been wasting his time on Penny, so he turns his attention to Leslie. Sheldon's uncomfortable with a change to his hamburger routine.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Kamp Krusty: Bart fakes his school report so that Homer will let him and Lisa go to Kamp Krusty. But the summer camp turns out to be a sweatshop and Bart leads an uprising...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Streetcar Named Marge: Homer's boorishness inspires Marge to give the performance of a lifetime in a musical version of A Streetcar Named Desire.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Walking Big & Tall: Marge urges Homer to lose weight. Instead, he finds a support group that encourages him to embrace his size. Lisa writes an anthem for Springfield.

programme.title: New: MAFS UK Does Come Dine...
programme.desc: ...with Me: Brand new series - Paul Liba hosts a sports-themed night with a riotous dessert, where everyone has to eat their pud while wearing boxing gloves. Will it pack a punch? (Ep4/5)

programme.title: America's Next Top Model
programme.desc: Matthew Rolston: Iconic reality with Tyra Banks. In a stylish shoot with photographer Matthew Rolston, the models must channel their inner underwater goddess!

programme.title: Gogglebox 2024
programme.desc: As the Goggleboxers hang up their Christmas stockings, a bumper edition takes a merry look at the best of the series, from Strictly and MAFS to Rivals, The Piano and Asia.

programme.title: First Dates: Valentine's Special
programme.desc: Comedian Vince, who usually only gets a Valentine's card from his mum, meets Brigitte Bardot lookalike Anna. Elaine's looking for a twinkle-toed gentleman. Does Steve have the right moves?

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Self-professed 'crazy camel lady' Sandra is after a mature man to ride off into the sunset with. Pansexual erotic writer Toni-Ann dreams of being the heroine in her own sexy novel.

programme.title: MAFS UK Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: Paul Liba hosts a sports-themed night with a riotous dessert, where everyone has to eat their pudding while wearing boxing gloves. Will his menu pack a punch? (Ep4/5)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers tune in to Bridgerton, SAS: Who Dares Wins, Freeze the Fear with Wim Hof, Made in Chelsea, and the news on Rishi Sunak and the Partygate scandal.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Stop or My Dog Will Shoot: After rescuing Homer from a corn maze, Santa's Little Helper is recruited as a police dog and is teamed up with grizzled veteran cop Lou.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Middle Earth Paradigm: Penny's Halloween party puts Leonard, Sheldon, Howard and Raj through a demanding new test of their social skills.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Dumpling Paradox: When Howard seduces Penny's friend and spends the night with her in Penny's flat, Penny asks if she can sleep on Leonard and Sheldon's sofa.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Daddy Issues: Gloria's ex-boyfriend Jorge's resemblance to Manny makes Jay question if he might be Manny's real dad. Phil agonises over getting an anniversary gift for Claire.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Bad Review: Dave tries to help Calvin find out why his employees are quitting.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Hockey Game: Tina enjoys the perks that come with her 'stardom' when she's mistaken for an A-list celebrity.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Commercial: Calvin asks Dave, Tina and Marty to help him film a TV ad for his business.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Team: Grover joins Calvin's youth basketball team, and Tina and Marty confront a long-buried family secret.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: It's the Great Pumpkin, Phil Dunphy: Phil and Claire want to celebrate Halloween in a big way, but no one else seems to share their enthusiasm for it.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Ten Years Later: Claire is determined to make up for her less-than-joyful mood at Jay and Gloria's wedding by throwing their 10th-anniversary party.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister, Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sports of the lawnmower, motorbike and bicycle variety.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Ms Jean's Southern Cuisine: Gordon's in Pennsylvania to help rescue a soul food restaurant that was opened 12 years ago by a retired special education teacher.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Barefoot Bob's: Gordon visits Barefoot Bob's beachside restaurant in Massachusetts, where husband and wife Marc and Lisa struggle to attract customers during the winter months.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Dad-Feelings Limited: As Comic Book Guy and his wife Kumiko debate whether to have a baby, his awesome origin story is revealed.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Diary Queen: Bart finds his old teacher's diary and learns a surprising secret. Then Lisa discovers an even bigger surprise.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Communication Deterioration: Raj is asked to create a message for NASA to use if one of their missions finds alien life. Penny considers taking up acting again.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Graduation Transmission: Leonard is invited to make a speech at his old high school. Howard and Sheldon can't make a toy drone fly.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: My Hero: Mitch's ex Teddy, a very personable and successful doctor, invites the family to a fundraising event at the local roller rink, where they all run rings around each other.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Games People Play: Phil gets a new RV and has high hopes of going on a family road trip, but Claire decides to let him learn the hard way why it will likely be a terrible idea.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Propagation Proposition: Penny's ex-boyfriend Zack and his wife want a baby, but when they encounter fertility problems, they ask Leonard for his help.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Confirmation Polarization: Sheldon and Amy are thrilled when their super-asymmetry theory is proved correct. Bernadette enjoys some big success at work.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Meteorite Manifestation: Sheldon is thrilled to help Howard and Bernadette with some bureaucratic paperwork, until he realises that they're breaking the law.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Donation Oscillation: Penny attempts to sabotage Leonard's efforts to help her ex-boyfriend Zack and his wife Marissa have a family of their own.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Renewal: The squad work together on an important high-stakes case, while simultaneously preparing for Captain Holt and Kevin's wedding vow renewal.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Last Day (Part 1/2): The first part of the finale, where the squad take stock of their eight years together and look towards their future.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Moonshine River: Marge and Lisa try to experience all of New York City's culture when the family travel to the Big Apple looking for Bart's long-lost love Mary Spuckler.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Adventures in Baby-Getting: Marge gets a new car that's perfect for a family of five - but what if she decides she wants a family of six!?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Grasshopper Experiment: Raj panics when his parents arrange a blind date for him. But he discovers that he can talk to her - after a few drinks.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cooper-Hofstadter Polarization: Sheldon and Leonard fall out when they're asked to collaborate at a physics conference. Penny tries to help but just makes things worse.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Loobenfeld Decay: Leonard and Sheldon each tell a lie to avoid going to see Penny singing on stage in a production of Rent, but Sheldon's fib gets out of control.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Pancake Batter Anomaly: Penny volunteers to nurse Sheldon when he's sick. But his friends, who know how miserable he is when he's ill, stay well away.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer the Heretic: Homer has a vision from God and decides to start his own religion, which doesn't go down too well with the neighbours.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa the Beauty Queen: Lisa wins second place in a beauty contest.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: My Fare Lady: Fed up with the thankless task of chauffeuring her kids around, Marge begins working as a driver for a ride-sharing service. Homer runs Moe's bar for a night.

programme.title: New: MAFS UK Does Come Dine...
programme.desc: ...with Me: Brand new series - Kristina Goodsell goes all-out with an orange-themed party. No red flags here, just one guest dressed as a traffic cone! But who's won the week? (Ep5/5)

programme.title: America's Next Top Model
programme.desc: Karolna Kurkov: Iconic reality with Tyra Banks. The models struggle to stay upright on a moving runway, and come out fighting in a wrestling photo shoot.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners Movie
programme.desc: (2011) Comedy with Simon Bird, Joe Thomas, Blake Harrison and James Buckley. School is over, so the boys celebrate with an outrageous lads holiday in Crete.

programme.title: Brussels, My Love?
programme.desc: From the economy to the climate and the EU's role in world affairs, this talk show sheds light on European affairs and the issues that impact on our daily lives as Europeans.

programme.title: Copshop
programme.desc: (2021) Action thriller with Gerard Butler. A hitman gets himself arrested so that he can get to a bad guy, who also got himself arrested, so that he could hide from the hitman.

programme.title: Late Night with the Devil
programme.desc: (2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: (2018) Gerard Butler and Peter Mullan star in Kristoffer Nyholm's tense thriller based on a true story. Three lighthouse keepers mysteriously disappear after finding a chest of gold bars.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: (1958) Drama. Jack Hawkins stars as Police Inspector Gideon, who faces outrage and danger in his quest to bring London's criminals to justice. With Anna Massey, John Loder and Cyril Cusack.

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: (1955) Atmospheric Victorian melodrama. Stewart Granger plays a sinister aristocrat who poisons his wife. However, his maid (Jean Simmons) knows his secret and tries to use it against him.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: (1956) Western with Glenn Ford, Ernest Borgnine, Rod Steiger and Valerie French. A cowboy is given a job by a rancher, sparking lethal jealousy in a colleague and desire in the boss's wife.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Van Heflin stars as a veteran frontiersman whose determination to mould his sons in his gun-totin' image backfires disastrously. With Tab Hunter and James Darren.

programme.title: Charlotte Gray
programme.desc: (2001) World War II thriller. Cate Blanchett stars as a secret agent sent to occupied France to aid the Resistance against the Nazis. But she has her own agenda. With Michael Gambon.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: (2002) Action-thriller starring Jason Statham. For a price, an underworld courier will deliver people or packages anywhere, no questions asked. But one job lands him in deep danger.

programme.title: Bob Trevino Likes It
programme.desc: (2024) Tracie Laymon's bitter-sweet comedy drama stars Barbie Ferreira as a young woman who meets a man with the same name as her useless father and spots the opportunity for a reset...

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Smallest Show On Earth
programme.desc: (1957) Comedy with Bill Travers and Virginia McKenna as a couple who inherit a dilapidated fleapit cinema, along with its equally dilapidated staff: Peter Sellers, Margaret Rutherford.

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: (1945) Five uncanny tales of the supernatural in one eerie package, the most famous starring ventriloquist Michael Redgrave and a deadly dummy. Prepare to be spooked.

programme.title: Anzio
programme.desc: (1968) Epic Second World War drama starring Robert Mitchum. A reporter gets trapped behind enemy lines during the costly 1944 Allied invasion of Italy. With Peter Falk and Robert Ryan.

programme.title: Dr Who and the Daleks
programme.desc: (1965) A spin-off of the cult television series starring Peter Cushing. Backyard-inventor Dr Who finds himself stuck on the irradiated planet Skaro, home of the cold and metallic Daleks.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2019) Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: (1995) Mel Gibson stars in this Oscar-laden epic as William Wallace - Scottish freedom fighter, rousing orator and keen face painter - who led his army into England, threatening the throne.

programme.title: The Mission
programme.desc: (1986) Award-winning epic with Robert De Niro and Jeremy Irons. A Jesuit priest and a reformed slave trader forge an alliance to protect Indigenous South Americans from colonial Portugal.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview...
programme.desc: ...Special: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the ingenious and atmospheric psychological thriller.

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: (1967) Julie Christie and Terence Stamp star in John Schlesinger's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's novel. Bathsheba is not short of suitors, but will marrying any of them lead to happiness?

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: (2022) It's Predator, 1719 style. Amber Midthunder stars as a Comanche hunter who must save her tribe from an extraterrestrial threat in this action prequel. If it bleeds, you can kill it.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: (2011) Sci-fi horror-comedy with John Boyega. Aggressive aliens unwisely pick a tough London estate as the beachhead for their invasion. But the locals are no pushovers...

programme.title: Copshop
programme.desc: (2021) Action thriller with Gerard Butler. A hitman gets himself arrested so that he can get to a bad guy, who also got himself arrested, so that he could hide from the hitman.

programme.title: Late Night with the Devil
programme.desc: (2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?

programme.title: Patrick Christys Tonight
programme.desc: Join Patrick for two hours of spirited debate and news making interviews. Top guests tackle the issues that matter, with a sharp take on every story.

programme.title: Patrick Christys Tonight Late Edition
programme.desc: Tomorrow's news, tonight. All the major stories making the front pages and full coverage of all the breaking news at home and abroad with Patrick Christys.

programme.title: The Late Show Live
programme.desc: Live from Washington DC, Bev Turner and Ben Leo bring you the latest from the US and what it means for Britain.

programme.title: Farage
